net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar
Class DaySelectorStyle

java.lang.Object
  net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar.DateChooserStyle
      net.cwroethel.swt.popupcalendar.DaySelectorStyle
Direct Known Subclasses:
DaySelectorStyleAdapter
public class DaySelectorStyle
extends DateChooserStyle

Style Class containing the default style for the GUI components used in the DaySelector as well as accessors to the component templates. This class is meant to be extended by users longing to set their own definitions. The preferred way to do that is to inherit constructors and all methods from this class and just implement the overrideStyle() class. This allows the definition of personal settings without having to deal with the internals of the style class. For additional conveniance a DaySelectorStyleAdapter is provided.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Will Roethel
